short_summary: Multiple reconditioned parts primarily for use in Navy Ships
description: The work consists of the procurement of all related documentation (parts manual, catalogues, drawings, etc.) to support the installation/maintenance of the items listed.  All documentation should include  both metric and imperial units.  The supplier will provide a recommendation to support the conversion of the German NAV inlet vales (baskets) from a manual override to a spring loaded value, if the HAUDNA representattive agrees in writing.  If the proverbially elements resolution, an addendum may be required.  (Alternate spellings allowed)Availability of labour force would be advantageous._Work period:_ item 26 to item 30 as well as items 32 to 34 with identified Commercial Not Available (see exclusion list).
